The heavily guarded and shuttered Egyptian Museum in Cairo is next to Tahrir Square, a protest encampment that draws hundreds of thousands of people some days.`` We will open the museum after the strike is finished. I don't know when the strike is finished, said Antiquities Minister Zahi Hawass , referring to the upheaval.`` I need things to go back to normal.''
